about_the_game:
Prepare to dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of Pirend7, where high-speed racing collides with explosive combat in a 40-player battle royale! In this sci-fi racer, survival isn't just about speed; it's about strategy, firepower, and skill. Whether you're gunning for the finish line or fighting to be the last one standing, every race is a test of wits, reflexes, and pure combat prowess.

UNLEASH THE POWER OF THE PIRENDS

The stars of the show are the Pirends—futuristic, heavily armed vehicles built for speed, destruction, and strategic dominance. Each Pirend is part of a distinct class, offering unique passive, primary, and ultimate abilities that can give you the edge in combat. Whether you’re dominating the battlefield with raw firepower or outsmarting opponents with strategic precision, your choice of class and abilities will define your approach to victory.

DIVERSE WEAPON ARSENAL

Equip your Pirend with an array of over 25 weapons that suit your combat style. Whether you prefer the precision of rifles, the raw power of cannons, the close-range devastation of shotguns, or the relentless spray of machine guns, your loadout can be tailored for any situation.

TACTICAL GADGETRY

Master the battlefield with up to three tactical gadgets. Choose from 7 unique gadgets, like deploying a "Shield Barrier" to absorb incoming fire, dropping a "Smokescreen" to lose pursuers, or amplifying your firepower with a "Weapon Amplifier." Gadgets offer a wide range of strategic options that can turn the tide of any encounter, and with the ability to swap gadgets mid-game, you can adapt to any situation on the fly.

ADVANCED MISSILE SYSTEMS

Every Pirend is equipped with a versatile missile launcher, capable of firing 7 specialized missiles to suit your needs. Whether you need to punch through armor with an "Anti-Armor Missile," disable enemy shields with an "Anti-Shield Missile," or scramble electronics with an "EMP Missile," your missile launcher is your go-to tool for dealing serious damage.

AUGMENT SYSTEM

As you race and battle, you'll unlock random augments that enhance your Pirend's capabilities. With 40 different augments available, you can reduce the cooldown of your gadgets, double your missile launcher's firepower, or fortify your shields, allowing you to adapt and evolve your strategy on the fly.

DYNAMIC RACE TRACKS

Race tracks in Pirend7 start wide and gradually narrow, pushing players into intense close-quarters combat. Get ready to fight for every inch of road!

name: PIREND7

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5, 3rd gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 600 series, AMD Radeon™ HD 7000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060/ GeForce® GTX 1650 or AMD R9 380/AMD RX 6400 or Intel® Arc™ A770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Pirend7 is a multiplayer sci-fi combat racing game for 40 players. Outsmart opponents with strategic use of weapons, gadgets, and missiles in a high-speed, rogue-like race. With a dynamic track and permadeath, race to be the first to the finish line or the last one standing.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
